task.title: Association type code constraint
task.shortdesc: Add a typeCode constraint for the relationship connecting two template classes.

step.cmd: Select the table row for an association.

In the Properties view CDA Tools tab, the Entry Type Code field will be visible if this tooling supports typeCode constraint for the source/target association you have selected. Select the desired type code from the pull-down list.

taskbody.result: This example adds an association from PatientDataSectionNCR to BirthHeadCircumference, with multiplicity 1..1 and typeCode DRIV.
